projects.title: SAM - Smart Asset Manager
projects.shortDescription:
SAM is a management and control solution software for construction companies.
The software includes:
- Individual equipment profiles
- Transparent planning and real usage
- Equipment, personnel & crew management
projects.description:
General Responsibilities:
- Write high-quality code that adheres to company coding standards
- Work effectively within a cross-functional team
- Communicate updates to the team during daily stand-ups
- Doing code reviews, sharing knowledge, and supporting the team
- Work with QA to help identify, troubleshoot, and correct problems
- Recommending and executing improvements
Day-to-day Activities:
- Daily standups: discuss progress and identify blockers.
- Sprint planning (weekly): define what can be delivered in the sprint by collaborating with the whole team
- Sprint grooming (weekly): review the backlog items and decides on the number of items to be developed during the next sprint
- Sprint retrospective (weekly): discuss what went well and what can be improved in a sprint
- Sprint delivery (weekly): review what features were built during a sprint
- Coding, code reviews

projects.title: Crocobet.com
projects.shortDescription: Worked in a team with other developers to redesign and refactor the main website of the gambling company (Crocobet). Worked as an Angular and Markup developer.

projects.title: Optimo
projects.shortDescription: Participated in creating stock management software (Optimo) for businesses to manage and control stocks, adjust waybills, and track statistics. Worked as an Angular and markup developer.
